title: Can't free up space on google photo app
content: I'm using google pixel3, I tried to free up my device storage on google Photo app, but during free up, I restart my phone and then this message is always displayed, so I keep wait after 1-2 hours and restart again, all my photos are gone I can't find on my phone or google photo(online), all DCIM file just gone, I don't know what can I save my photos.
